title: Matthew Taljard
text:
Matthew Taljard (born 8 September 1985) is a South African <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player, currently playing with <a href="Romania">Romania</a>n <a href="SuperLiga%20%28rugby%29">SuperLiga</a> side <a href="Farul%20Constan%C5%A3a%20%28rugby%29">Farul Constanţa</a>. His regular position is hooker.
Career.
He made his debut for the in the <a href="2008%20Currie%20Cup%20First%20Division">2008 Currie Cup First Division</a> season and has represented them until 2013 in the <a href="Currie%20Cup">Currie Cup</a> and <a href="Vodacom%20Cup">Vodacom Cup</a> competitions.
He joined <a href="Romania">Romania</a>n <a href="SuperLiga%20%28rugby%29">SuperLiga</a> side <a href="Farul%20Constan%C5%A3a%20%28rugby%29">Farul Constanţa</a> in 2013.
Personal.
He's the older brother of rugby player <a href="Jeff%20Taljard">Jeff Taljard</a>.
